name: Max Lilja
description: '''Max Lilja''' (born 27 October 1975) is a [[Finland|Finnish]] [[cello]] player. He is best known as a founding member of the Finnish cello [[Metal music|metal]] band [[Apocalyptica]], a band he left in 2001 to join the Finnish [[thrash metal]] band [[Hevein (band)|Hevein]]. Beginning in 2007, Lilja has been a recording and touring member of [[Tarja Turunen]]'s solo band. Throughout his career, Lilja has continued to play classical music alongside rock, metal, and crossover projects.
